output: word_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
setwd("~/Code/NCBA/resources")
source("ncba_functions.R")
library(auk)
```

Assign a species and get the records in EBD format with duplicates removed.
```{r}
species <- "Turkey Vulture"
records <- get_observations(species = species, EBD_fields_only = TRUE) %>%
  to_EBD_format() %>%
  auk_unique()
```

Pull out records with inappropriate behavior codes.
```{r}
# Innapropriate behavior codes
bad_codes <- c("S", "P", "A")

singers <- records %>% 
  filter(breeding_code %in% bad_codes) %>%
  select(-c(state, state_code, country, bcr_code, usfws_code, iba_code, 
            locality_id, year, month, taxonomic_order, category))
print(singers)
```

Breeding boxplot
```{r}
breeding_boxplot(species = species, data = records)
```
